name: YaHei_All
css:
html,body,form,div,ul,ol,li,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,table,tr,th,td,p,input,dl,dt,dd,ul,ol,li,input,textarea,

a:not([class*="fb-share"])
:not([class*="tw-share"])
:not([class*="gp-share"])
:not([class*="ml-share"])
:not([class*="tx-share"])
:not([class*="mr-share"])
:not([class*="rd-share"])
:not([class*="pt-share"]),

span:not([class*="DPvwYc"])
:not([class*="site-nav-icon site-nav-icon-highlight"])
:not([class*="site-nav-icon"])
:not([class*="icomoon-forum"])
:not([class*="icomoon-cart"])
:not([class*="icomoon-burger"])
:not([class*="icomoon-search"])
:not([class*="icomoon-comment"]),
font{ font-family:"Microsoft YaHei"!important; }
